endpoints.description: Submit cargo and schedule data to receive optimized routing for vehicles.
Retrieve real-time status and location data for all active vehicles.
Submit vehicle details to generate a maintenance schedule based on usage data.
Retrieve a detailed fuel consumption analysis for a specified time period.
Update information about a fleet vehicle, including capacity and operational status.
Remove a vehicle from the fleet management system.
Retrieve aggregated performance statistics for completed deliveries.
Add a new vehicle to the fleet management database with its specifications.
Retrieve past routing data and path analytics for specified vehicles.
Set up alerts for excess fuel consumption parameters for real-time notifications.
